Gotron

Gotron got the message and turned to Starscream.

"Sorry. Duty calls."

"Sure. See you around."

The two friends shook hands and Gotron blasted off. Starscream walked 
beside KitKat.

"If you're thinking the Alliance was spying, maybe it was that 
Bloodystrike, but not Gotron. He's a friend and wouldn't do anything 
to betray me. I actually think he may want to leave the Alliance and 
join us."
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon smiled evily.

"Good, at least we got one of them. I wish you had gotten the body 
though. We could have used it. Never mind. Ramulus still awaits. But 
before we attack again, we must work on a new weapon. We have to 
focus on something to disable those anti-chips. I'll have to refer to 
my fathers research back on Cybertron." They all arrived at the base. 
Prebon gave orders.

"Everyone who needs a CR Chamber use it. I don't want any injured men 
right now." The Trainers walked in to the base and got into the CR 
Chambers. Prebon was going to, but first he went to the cargo area, 
and opened a secret panel. Inside was a container, and inside tha was 
the spark of Lightrade. Prebon whispered.

"Don't worry old friend. I'm going to get you that body."

Prebon didn't fully trust Slayer, so he didn't want everyone in the 
CR's with him having full roam of the ship. He waited for Slayer to 
enter.

(I really like Prebon's character. I'm going to start writing a 
fanfic and upload it to this sites files section so that if I refer 
to anything from his past, you can all look it up and understand.)
